pullRequest.title: Restructure MP API projects
pullRequest.bodyText:
Move MP API project bnd files that don't have source code in OL GH to new com.ibm.websphere.org.eclipse.microprofile and io.openliberty.org.eclipse.microprofile projects
Delete the other components whose bnd files were moved to the new projects.
Update gradle publish task to handle a sub bundle in a project having a different bundle version.

beforeCommit.message:
Cleanup MP API components

- Delete the components' whose bnd files were moved to the new project.
- Remove properties and META-INF directories in these projects that were
unused as well.

nodes.bodyText:
What does this root bnd.bnd file in the com.ibm.websphere.org.eclipse.microprofile project do?
Initially I expected it to be doing nothing, but there's quite a lot in here if that's the case.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,24 @@
+#*******************************************************************************
+# Copyright (c) 2020 IBM Corporation and others.
+# All rights reserved. This program and the accompanying materials
+# are made available under the terms of the Eclipse Public License v1.0
+# which accompanies this distribution, and is available at
+# http://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-v10.html
+#
+# Contributors:
+#     IBM Corporation - initial API and implementation
+#*******************************************************************************
+-include= ~../cnf/resources/bnd/bundle.props
+bVersion: 1.0
+
+-sub: *.bnd
+
+publish.wlp.jar.suffix: dev/api/stable
+
+instrument.disabled: true
+
+-buildpath: \
+  com.ibm.websphere.javaee.cdi.1.2;version=latest, \
+  com.ibm.websphere.javaee.interceptor.1.2;version=latest, \
+  com.ibm.websphere.javaee.jsonp.1.0, \
+  org.eclipse.microprofile.reactive.messaging:microprofile-reactive-messaging-api;version=1.0.0

nodes.bodyText: Copyright dates on all these modified bnd files should be updated.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -26,14 +25,4 @@ Export-Package: \
 Include-Resource: \
   @${repo;org.eclipse.microprofile.config:microprofile-config-api;1.1;EXACT}
 
-
 WS-TraceGroup: APPCONFIG
-
--buildpath: \
-	com.ibm.websphere.javaee.cdi.1.2;version=latest, \
-	com.ibm.ws.org.osgi.annotation.versioning;version=latest
-
-instrument.disabled: true
-
-publish.wlp.jar.suffix: dev/api/stable

nodes.bodyText:
This looks iffy. Previously we were including the 1.4 API jar, now we're including... the whole com.ibm.websphere.org.eclipse.microprofile project? What does that contain?
Also, it's worth noting that different versions of the MP specs often contain different conflicting versions of the same classes, so if we were putting all of them on the same classpath, that would not be ideal.

Comments to explain what this is doing and why it's needed would be helpful.
Possibly some of it could be refactored into separate methods to make it more readable.

nodes.bodyText:
I can see that this is solving the problem of exposing the sub-bundles to fat tests which want to depend on them.
However, it looks a little at odds with what's in the Gradle user guide here: https://docs.gradle.org/current/userguide/declaring_dependencies.html#sec:resolvable-consumable-configs
The user guide suggests:

canBeResolved and canBeConsumed both default to true.
for a configuration exposed to other projects as a dependency, you want canBeResolved = false and canBeConsumed = true

I'm not necessarily saying this is wrong, since I'm not familiar enough with gradle (and I wouldn't be surprised if we were doing something a bit weird), but thought it worth mentioning that it looks different to what the user guide suggests.

commit.message:
Move MP API projects to a single component

- Move MP API project bnd files that don't have source code in OL GH to
new com.ibm.websphere.org.eclipse.microprofile project

Cleanup MP API components

- Delete the components' whose bnd files were moved to the new project.
- Remove properties and META-INF directories in these projects that were
unused as well.

Move io.openliberty MP API projects to a single project

- Move bnd files from individual spec levels for io.openliberty projects
to the parent project like did with
com.ibm.websphere.org.eclipse.microprofile MP API projects.
Clean up eclipse files from io.openliberty MP API projects

beforeCommit.message: Move contextpropagation 1.1 bundle to io.openliberty

afterCommit.message: Move contextpropagation 1.1 bundle to io.openliberty
